summary: After developing a flying web-cam Alain has his boss and wife over for dinner. She turns up to be very rude, and the same night Alain finds a live rare Scandinavian lemming clogging up the kitchen sink. The night things start going wrong.
cast: Laurent Lucas|Charlotte Gainsbourg|Charlotte Rampling|André Dussollier|Jacques Bonnaffé|Véronique Affholder|Michel Cassagne|Florence Desille|Emmanuel Gayet|Félix Gonzales|Nicolas Jouhet|Fabrice Robert|Natacha Boussaa|Luc Thelliez
title: Lemming
